content: Features Appearance and Layout / Responsive layout / Light/Dark mode Â Globally consistent design language Â Pagination supported Â Easy-to-use and self-expanding table of contents Â Multilanguage supported and i18n ready Â Beautiful CSS animation Social and Comment Systems Â Gitalk comment system supported by Gitalk Â Facebook comments system supported by Facebook Â Telegram comments system supported by Comments Extended Features Â Search supported by Lunr.js or algolia Â highlighting code Â Copy code to clipboard with one click Â Mathematical formula supported by $ \KaTeX $ Â Diagrams shortcode supported by mermaid Â Interactive data visualization shortcode supported by ECharts
